Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback; it will help us improve for the future. We hope you'll give us another chance.

Summary Heading: Everything about this place is CHEAP except their price
Summary: I am not very picky; however, for the over two hundred dollars a night, I would expect a bit more. Yes, the location is excellent - across the street from the beach, a walking distance to the pier and Main street. The view from my room was OK too. Maybe when the hotel was Best Western, it was worth the amount they charge. Definitely not now. Everything is screaming CHEAP!! It is dirty, chairs on the nice balcony are sticky and disgusting. I did not want to touch them - not to mention sit in them. There is no table, nothing else just these two cheap, old, dirty chairs. The screen door was literally hanging down - so damaged. The elevator is smelly and dirty. Carpets are disgusting. Bed sheets are the worst I've seen in years. I wasn't brave enough to lift them and look underneath
Manager Response: We're sorry that you had a less than stellar experience with us. We'd like a chance to make things right so please try us again!

Summary: Not to bad of a place just don't like the 10 dollars for parking! Great location just across from the peri and the beach! Just walking distance. The breakfast lady is very gracious! She is the best part of the morning!
Manager Response: Dear Kevin, Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased to learn you had a pleasurable stay and we invite you to stay with us again in the future whether it is for business or pleasure.  Best Regards.

Summary: I was in town for business and wanted a place near main street so I could walk to dinner each night.  This would be a fun place to go for a beach week.  You are close to downtown, almost every night something is going on, and right across the street from the beach.  Parking to down below, they charge 20.00 bucks a day ;(  I couldn't for the life of me figure out why they would take the bathroom sink out of the bathroom and put it in the bedroom until I realized it would make a great bar area set up. It is not a luxury hotel but rather just a place to go back to to sleep.  I would not recommend it for business    travelers as there is no printer available for patrons.  The front desk did offer to print my boarding pass for me.  I did not eat the breakfast at the hotel, instead I
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are pleased to learn you enjoyed your stay regardless of minor setbacks. We hope to see you again in the near future whether it is for business or pleasure. Again, we apologize for inconvenience.  Best Regards.

Summary Heading: Cig burns in Blanket? No Food? Lied to by Management? Don't Stay Here.
Summary: I was in town for a conference, and the conference hotel was fully booked - so I picked this one. Mistake. The price was very high, and the amenities are lacking. I had a great view, but the sheets were thin, blanket wasn't a blanket at all, and when I requested an extra blanket I had to go and get it, and it had cig burn holes in it! Carpet was gross, toilet small, no breakfast...on and on. My wife and baby daughter joined me for part of the conference, and they didn't have pack and plays - so I had to go out and buy one.   My wife was so dissatisfied that we moved to the Pasea hotel (just down PCH) once a room became available. The Pasea is excellent - and costs about the same. Before we moved to the new hotel, we asked what the cancellation policy is. The hotel manager told
Manager Response: Dear David, On behalf of the hotel staff were sorry we didn't meet your standards. We are glad you found other accommodations that suited your needs. Best Regards.

Summary Heading: Cancelled my Reservation and Hotel Still Charged...Management is Slow to Respond
Summary: I booked this hotel for a trip, but later found a hotel for a better price.  I cancelled my hotel within the timeframe that the site said was allowed.  However the hotel still charged my credit card for the room.  For over a month now i have been trying to get the charged refunded  and the Hotel seems to make every excuse they have to why they cannot refund...not getting the cancellation- so i sent them the confirmation, wanting verfication i was charged- sent them this,...this same info has been sent multiple times...each time they say they are going to send the refund, then it starts all over....Book someplace else...SHADY BUSINESS
Manager Response: We are sorry for the inconvenience your are experiencing we were advised of full refund already being processed please call your bank for further steps. As we have already processed the refund on our end it is now dealt with your financial institution directly.

Summary Heading: Good location, decent amenities but the staff is ambivalent
Summary: I picked this place for the location mainly, they have great parking underneath, the rooms are very clean, the hot tub on the roof is a nice touch, breakfast was decent and the lady staffing that room was the nicest out of all of them. The staff really didn't want to bother with anything.  It was a great hub for us to drive all over, explore, shop, go to the beach and walk around HB everywhere but don't expect a 5 star/fancy. More than adequate less than luxurious!
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay and had a magnificent experience. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: We chose this motel because of the rave reviews. I must say we were a little disappointed. It is the perfect position located a block from Main Street Huntington Beach. The staff were quite friendly and helpful and the room was very clean. But...there are no tea or coffee making facilities, there is a 7 Eleven on the next corner that makes nice coffee though you just have to get dressed and go out side, it was raining when we stayed! It is also very noisey being right on the highway. Would we stay again - no only because of the noise, if you are a heavy sleeper you will be fine!
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your feedback. I am sorry our staff failed to mention our breakfast in the morning from 6-9 and our coffee station next to the lobby office which is available for our guests through out the entire evening. You shouldve also had coffee and tea in the room next to your coffee maker. I do agree the highway noise might be a little to noisy for some poeple. Thank you for your business. And we are sorry you had to experience the noise. We hope you give us a second chance in the future. Best Regards.

Summary Heading: Good location, but just an "average" hotel with a few quirky things
Summary: The location of this hotel was very good.  Directly across from the beach.  Unfortunately we were there during the rains in February so didn't really get to the beach.  We had asked for an early check in and upon arriving found our room was not ready, which was okay.  However, we were told to come back around 2:15 and it should be done, which it was not.  In fact, even at 3:00 (check in time) the room was still not ready.  We finally got into our room around 3:30.  Sad to say, but after traveling had to use a bathroom, but alas, they do not have one in the lobby area so had to wait for  our room to be done.  The hotel was a little different than most places we stay.  The oddest thing we found was that you had to ask for a special key to use the fitness room, business center and
Manager Response: Dear Guest, We are sorry you didn't get to experience the beach as you might've plamned to due too the rain. I want to apologize for the inconvenience of the room not being ready as promised when you first arrived. Unfortunately we only have enough parking spaces for one vehicle per room on our property we dont allow additional vehicles on sight. We are sorry we were not up to your standards. Thank You for your business.

Summary: This is really a 2* hotel in a great location, 2 or 3 blocks from the pier on the beachfront. So you're paying for location, not for facilities and quality. No complaints, just a bit pricey for what it is. Underground parking for $10 a day.

Excellent location, walking distance to everything! Easy check in, it would have been nice if the guy would have pulled the straw out of his mouth to talk. Breakfast was typical hotel food, no fruit but not bad. In room coffee, microwave and refrigerator. Rooms appear to have recently been redone. Partial ocean views. I was taken aback by the parking charge as I saw this nowhere in their ad?? Nevertheless, we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear MizKChandler, Thank You for your kind feedback. We are glad you had an ejoyable experience and we would love for you to stay with us again in the future. We have reviewed the booking source you went through and it seems they dont mention our parking fee and we are looking further into that so other guests will be aware of our fee. I want to apologize for the inconvenience that may have cause and i want to thank you for mentioning to us your experience at check in. We can assure we will address the issue must i agree its unprofessional of our staff. Again, sorry for the inconvenience that caused and we would really love to welcome you and your family back to our hotel.

Summary Heading: Good value at modest price Hotel
Summary: Great location. Right across the street from the beach. Relatively low cost. nice free breakfast. small clean room. close to downtown. underground parking for $10/night. Overall- good value for the low price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback. We hope to see you again.

Summary: I found this hotel as a special price...Great deal on a Monday night.  Knew about the $10 parking after reading reviews.  My friend drove separate and parked on the street.  Woke up to a $44 ticket, so check the signs. Room was really clean, bath area looks brand new.   Was really disappointed about the broken hot tub, oh well the beach is amazing! Loved the restaurants / stores are within walking distance.   Will stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. I apologize if it was an inconvenience to have our hot tub closed. We are trying to do our best job to fix the issue and get it back and running. We are pleased to hear about your enjoyable stay. I hope too see you back on your next visit to Huntington Beach.

Summary: This hotel is right across the PCH from the beach.  It is super clean, and comfortable. All rooms have a balcony with at LEAST a peeka boo view of the beach.   They failed to note that there is a $10 per night parking charge, and also that the SPA is out of service until further notice. IF the spa is important to you.......check before checking in!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback on your recent stay we love to hear back from you to help us understand what we need to improve on. I am very glad to hear overall you had a great experience although i do agree it must have been a small inconvenience at the time for the spa to be out of service. I hope you understand somethings unexpected things happen that cause small inconveniences like this. We are working on fixing the issue with our Jacuzzi to open it back up. As far as for parking i do want to apologize for not mentioning it at check in. But there is a $10.00 fee for parking if you want to park your vehicle with us which is not outrages compared to most hotels in the area. Please be advised this is noted on all websites as well as on your check in sheet. Again we are sorry for the small encountered problems but we hope you keep us in mid on your next visit to Huntington Beach.

Summary: I love the area this hotel is in. There is beach access across the street, easy walk to shopping, dining and bars. Hotel is nicely maintained and the staff is attentive and polite. The breakfast buffet is decent. The rooms near the lobby can be noisy due to foot traffic and ice machine. There is a $10 upcharge for parking and at times it has been difficult to find a spot. This has been our "go to" spot in Huntington Beach because of its location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback we love to hear about your experiences. I am very glad you enjoyed your stay with us and I hope to welcome your family and friends back on your next visit.

Summary Heading: Brilliant Location, Dated furnishings, Breakfast room tiny
Summary: The location of this hotel is brilliant the rooms are a little dated,  but large the breakfast room is crazy small, only fits about 10 people at a time at a push, but this seems to be the norm in America the staff are very friendly

The room was great, clean and had an ocean view. It was a spacious room with a very comfortable bed. A fridge and microwave are included for convenience. Great location! Lovely beach, shopping and dining.
Manager Response: Dear Wendy, Thank you for your feedback. I am pleased to learn you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you and your family on your next trip out to Huntington Beach.

Summary: The staff was accommodating.  Didn't have the breakfast.   Parking was good and the location is ideal.  Room was adequate, clean, with a decent oceanview (view of the oil derrick as well).  It was quiet for being right on PCH.  We were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go. I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Shauna, We appreciate your feedback on your recent stay and i am glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you and your family in the near future on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Kind Regards, Leslie A.

Summary: This was a perfectly adequate hotel, very clean, in a great location to walking the downtown and the beach.  The breakfast is pretty bland and the breakfast room is tiny but Starbucks is 2-3 blocks away.  They need to add some fruit to their menu.  Would stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Nancy,  Thank you for taking the time to give us your feedback. I am happy to inform you that we will be doing some upgrades the next couple of months therefore we will be having more new items for breakfast and a bigger breakfast area. We hope to see you again in the near future on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary: It was our last night before flying out of LA and my partner really wanted to stay in Huntington. Hotels were all exxy so I booked this one and paid for a view because it was oceanfront (across the highway). The room was disappointing. Very average, the balcony overlooked a building site...which thankfully has no work happening because it was right beside us ( I asked at reception & was told "oh nothing's happened there for ages"). We couldn't open doors & windows with the noise but the massive old air conditioner wasn't quiet either!   The sink is in the room which is weird, the carpet was pretty yuck & it was run down. Breakfast was fine and the reception staff were friendly enough, although I asked for a late checkout (before we saw the room) & there was no way that was
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your candid review of your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is extremely valuable to us, as we strive to improve with each and every stay. I greatly appreciate your comments towards the amenities in the room and i agree we could certainly take care of these issues to make sure we provide you with the upmost cleanliness and comfortability. Late check outs are available upon the hotels availabilty and sometimes we are limited to time and we need our hoesekeeping staff to clean the rooms efficiently rather then having little time between guests check out and check in time and having to rush to clean the room we also wouldnt want our guests to be on time for check in and not have a room ready. I would love for you to reach out to me directly on your next visit to Huntington Beach at huntingtonbeachinnpch@gmail.com to talk about how we can better accomodate you on your next stay. Best Regards, Leslie A.

Summary: This hotel is awesome.  Perfect location as it is close to the beach and views from balcony. The maid service was exceptional, i'm a slob on vacation and they really cleaned and organized the room each day, which was nice to come back to after a long day. Walking distance to downtown with lots of restaurants. Friendly staff members.  Would definitely return.     .
Manager Response: Greetings, Thank you for such positive review. I am beyond happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were very pleased with the services housekeping provided as well as the Front Desk Staff. We lool forward to your next visit and we encourage you to contact us directly to better accomodate your stay. We hope you find yourself doing great. Best Regards Leslie A.

Summary: Huntington Beach Inn was in a perfect location, 4 blocks walking distance to the main part of huntington beach pier. My husband and I go to California a few times a year, and always spend a day in huntington beach, but never actually stayed over. We booked this room last minute, and the front desk was more than happy to accommodate us. It was a very clean hotel, with many amenities. Parking was cheap also, only $10 a day.
Manager Response: Dear Jaclyn, We are pleased to hear you had a wonderful time during your stay. As you mentioned we are located just in the right place near Main St. ,restaurans and shops, the pier, and of course across from the beach. I am very delighted to know our staff did a great job with accomodating our guests. Our hotel aims to provide a truly unique and we are thrilled we were able to provide that for you. Again, thank you for your comments and we hope on your next visit to Huntington Beach you stay with us.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary Heading: Great deal, awesome location, but needs some maintenance.
Summary: My stay was only one night.  We stayed in the first floor, ocean view, jacuzzi room.  The rate was slightly less than others in the area which is always a plus.  The location was awesome for walking the beach, pier, and shopping/restaurant row area.  The room had two separate balconies with a great view.  Underground parking was a plus, but they do charge $10 for parking.  The breakfast in the morning was minimal with dry bagels and limited selection.  They did have a waffle maker, but I didn't have one. If you're just looking for a muffin and juice/coffee, that's about all you should expect.  The cons of this hotel is that it needs some updating and repair/replacement of furniture and fixtures.  Although the outdoor patio was lovely, the old, plastic chairs out there had turned
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your feedback. I want to apologize for any inconvenience you may have had during your stay and fo not being able to meet your expectations. I do want to share with you however that we will be doing renovations in the next few months on the Jacuzzi rooms meaning they will have new carpets asnd furniture as well as the outside patio furniture. I appreciate you bringing to my attention certain things that could easily be improved with our maintenance as well as our housekeeping team. As you mentioned on this review we will gladly welcome you back on your next visit to Huntington Beach and we hope this time your expectations are met.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary: Cheap and cheerful motel large room with all facilities. Basic nothing fancy clean and adequate for the price. The air con was too noisy to use however so the choice was fry or stay awake humming!   Our room was ground floor at the side so no view.   Its reasonably central a short walk to bars shops and restaurants. Large basement parking .
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for taking the time to give us some feedback as we are always looking for ways to improve. I do want to apologize for the inconvenience of the A/C  not working properly and for the noise you may have encountered. We will definitely let our maintenance crew know about the issues so our future guests wont come across these same ones. Please feel free to contact me directly by calling the hotel or emailing me at  huntingtonbeachinnpch@gmail.com for how we can better serve you on your next visit we are glad to always work with our guests and improving their stay.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary: We stayed here for one night. The room was clean and update with new carpet, furniture, and television. We stayed on the first floor with no view although we had a porch.   Contentinal breakfast is self served and much to choose from.   I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for your kind comments. We are delighted to hear you had such a pleasant stay and you were able to enjoy from our breakfast. We look forward to serving you in the future do not hesistate on contacting us for a better experience.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary Heading: Felt like I was in trouble and being babysat.
Summary: If I could give it a one I would. We arrived and Our room was not ready. we where offered to pay for parking and get a call when it was ready. They said 20 min. seems to be routine. so we sat on the steps and waited in the sun. I then noticed that they don't allow you to have any guests. so I asked about it. I was told no. I said not to spend the night but I have family here that will want to visit. I was told no. I was upset so I said I will only stay one night then not my original 2 nights. he said ok. When I got to the room he called and said his boss said we will still be charged for the two days because we booked through trip advisor. Now I'm really pissed. We then notice there are ants all over the Jacuzzi. we call. he sends someone to come squish them. the guy leaves. He
Manager Response: Dear Patrick, I want to apologize for the inconvenience that may have caused you during your stay i want to reassure you we have taken care of the issues. As far as our policy on no visitors we are sorry that was an issue for you we like to minimize as much as we can on partys and disruption we have sometimes to other guests when people visit. We hope to have you back in the near future and better serve you.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary: Me and my wife stayed two nights here and we had a great time! The room was large and pretty nice, and the hotel is located right across the PCH from the beach. you are about a 5 minute walk to the downtown strip  and another 5 minutes to the fancy shmancy new mall that just opened up there. We came as a couple here but it would be great for a family stay as well! Loved it!
Manager Response: Dear Mike, Thank you for the feedback you have provided our trip advisor community we apreciate you taking the time to let us know how your recent stay was. I am very pleased to hear it was great. We definitely look forward to welcoming you and your family on your next visit to Huntington Beach. Best Regards,  Leslie

Summary: The hotel is a little old but not in bad shape. Parking is $10 a night extra. The hotel is directly across the street from the beach. Check in process is a bit slow. Bed was very firm. Queen room was a tad small. They do not have roll away beds but there is not enough room for a roll away. Balcony is two plastic chairs. Book through travel company to save $.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind feedback.

Summary: The check in should have been at 3pm. We arrived just after 3pm and our room, along with other guests‚Äô rooms were not available. They asked if we could wait for 20 minutes. We said ‚Äúyes, no problem‚Äù. WE WAITED FOR MORE THAN AN HOUR! Just when we started questioning, saying that we were no longer wait, we were able to make the check in. Just before that, when arguing with them they asked with we wanted a dirty room instead of a clean one or if we wanted our money back in order to leave! Can you believe?! It is certainly not the way to treat clients! We are never coming back! They even refused to give us a discount for causing us to lose a good part of the afternoon! They charged the role amount of the room rate at the check in!
Manager Response: Dear Carla, I want to apologize for the inconvenience it was at time of check in as your room should have been reaady by 3pm. That day we were short handed and due to it being saturday we were extremely busy unfortunately these things happen unexpectedly and they cause a delay. I am glad you were able to still check in to your room regardless of the time. Again, i am very sorry we didnt meet your expectations and i sincerely apologize on behalf of the housekeeping team and or staff. I really hope to see you again on your next visit to Huntington Beach please feel free to contact me directly and i will gladly help you on your next stay.  Best Reagrds,  Leslie

Summary: The rooms are large and quiet and pretty good value. Modern and reasonably well appointed.  Good parking, great location, 3 minute walk to the pier. Not a lot of noise from other guests even on the weekend.
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you for your awesome feedback. I am pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. We hope to see you and your family again in the near future on your next visit to Huntington Beach.  Best Regards, Leslie

Summary: Well I have to start by saying if you're planning to visit Huntington Beach you'd be crazy to stay anywhere else. It is the perfect location and a a very reasonable price.  5 minute walk to Main Street for the bars and restaurants and then every night we would walk back along the beach. Beautiful!  We were on the top floor and from our balcony had a perfect view of the beach and the sea.....with the sun on us all afternoon/evening.  The front desk were great, room was a very good size and had everything we needed. It was so quiet every night too.  Breakfast didn't have many options for me as I'm vegan but if you've no dietary hold backs it looked very nice. The gym was a little small and basic but you also have the the beach path opposite to run along.  Underground parking was
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Matthew, Thank you for your amazing feedback. I am pleased to know that you had such a wonderful stay. I agree with you as breakfast is complimentary we do offer just something fast but we will definitely be open to more options in the future. We gladly welcome you and your family on your next trip to Huntington Beach and hope to see you soon.  Best Regards,  Leslie

Summary: This is a decent hotel for the price but the location is superior. You can walk across the street to the beach and there are numerous retail shops and restaurants within walking distance. The street market was a fun way to spend the late afternoon and evening and I would recommend this hotel for the not so picky traveler. It is clean but not fancy.

Summary Heading: great  weekend of volleyball and fun
Summary: Loved the rooms.. clean  partial ocean view  stayed 2 nights for volleyball tourney and girls weekend  wonderful jacuzzi with rooftop ocean views.  Free parking and breakfast were nice touches.  The pier is only a few blocks and an enjoyable walk.  Will return

Summary Heading: Surfing and travel the CA coast
Summary: Good hotel right across from beach for surfing - a few short blocks from the main strip with all the shops and restaurants (just far enough from the crowd and noise).  The rooms are clean and the staff were very friendly and informative.  24/7 coffee/tea - great when you have to be up early to bike/run/surf.  Free breakfast - better than some (c'mon it's a free breakfast - no one cooking you a gourmet chef prepared breakfast - eat up and roll out the door).  Enjoyed closeness to beach - really enjoyed the roof top hot tub at sunset.  Parking fee $10/ night - much more reasonable than other area hotels.

Summary Heading: Limited in Amenities but Loaded with Accesibility
Summary: It may not have a 5 star dining restaurant or a luxury lobby, but the Huntington Beach Inn is ideally located.  A walk across the PCH and you are in prime beach territory.  Although the bang for the buck factor is nice, the facility is a wee bit dated.  But with a location as such, it was just what I needed.  The rooms are that of a beach motel; the sand these things much see day in and day out must be incredible.  Kudos for cleanliness as my expectations were a sandy mess as I've seen at other beachfront hotels.  bedding was updated, as was the carpet and bathroom, but I don't need super chic to be satisfied.  Everything served it's purpose.  A complimentary continental breakfast is provided and was delicious.  The room it was served in was small and cramped, but I guess you

Our room was right next to check in yet was relatively quiet and private.  The bed was very comfortable.  The room had a small porch area with plastic chairs but was inaccessible because we couldn't open the sliding door.  The place is right across from the beach so that was very nice.  The beach, needless to say, was just beautiful.

Overinflated prices for the rooms, jacuzzi is sad, and very poor customer service.  Oh, and let's not forget the whole floor smelling like pot every day that I was here for 3 days.  The front desk manager acted like he was doing us a personal favor when he had to do anything for us.  There's nothing special about staying here.  I won't be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. It really helps us learn where we can improve.

Summary: The place was clean and convenient however, NOT worth the headache of dealing with such a unfriendly, uncooperative front desk staff.  Where do I start...Long story but will try to keep it short.  Requested a king bed (because no 2 queen beds available) when we made the reservation; friend called to request a roll away and was YELLED at stating absolutely ONLY 2 people in a king room.  (That was #1); Friend proceeded to pay for room but was still required to leave a $100 deposit for the room, really? (#2); When my other friend and I arrived in separate cars and proceeded to leave the deposit, innocently proceeded to each give our car info for parking and was told only 1 parking space for room (not explained on website).  When I asked where I should park, thinking they would have
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! Your feedback is important to us, and so is your satisfaction.

Summary: Made a quick trip with my daughter to Huntington and decided to try this hotel. We were only there for one night so I asked for a late check out for the next day. We were checking out on Sunday and I had checked on line and saw they had plenty of rooms available but was told I had to check out by 11:30am at the latest and the girl at the desk was not even willing to discuss or allow me to pay additional. The next morning we went to check out at 11:15am with the same girl at the desk and I asked if we could keep our car there while we went to have lunch before leaving. I was told in a very rude way that my car had to be out by noon. Not wanting to start another useless conversation with her, we left. The garage was maybe a quarter full so I could not understand her attitude. The
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! We will address this to the staff immediately.

Summary: What an amazing stay and a world class resort.  The staff was unbelievable and outgoing, catering to your needs.  At the pool you have access to beach chairs, towels, body boards, umbrellas to take across the street to the beach at no cost.  The rooms were clean and spacious, lobby was gorgeous and the quality of food and drink was exceptional.  A great place to stay and highly recommend a few nights at this prime destination hotel!

This is actually my second time to this property. The location is pretty great for a small property,right across from the beach. The rooms are newly remodeled & comfortable. No pool, is a bummer ,the family size hot tub on the roof though works. It's the management and lack of friendliness that makes this place terrible. We had found our price on hotels tonight and negotiated that room rate and then they charged us more both nights. And hit my credit card four times. Just disappointed. Just check your bills watch your visa. I would rate this place because of management at 2-2.5. Lack of friendliness minimal amount of towels wash clause and amenities
Manager Response: We're sorry that you had a less than stellar experience with us. We'd like a chance to make things right so please try us again!

Summary Heading: Poor management customer service, Charged my card with out authorization.
Summary: on 06/19/16 I reserved a room at the Huntington Beach inn thru priceline for two nights 6/19 and 6/20. I called at 9pm to advise the front desk clerk I would be getting in at 1am and wanted to confirm reservations made online for 2 queens as it was for My Fiance,myself and 14yr old son for fathers day. They confirmed everything,and when we got in were given room 110 on the bottom floor right next to front counter. I signed normal paperwork checking in and gave a credit card for "incidentals"Upon entering room we realized it was only 1 king bed, and after speaking with front desk we were told they were booked up and that was the only room. Additionally I was told they do not have roll away beds and when I asked for extra bedding he gave me 1 blanket.   Next morning upon being
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! We will address this to the staff immediately.

Summary: Room was comfortable and clean and right across from beach.  Walking distance to Main Street for restaurants and shops and pier.  Breakfast was okay not a big deal.  Our room was on first floor right across from desk (not a very good spot).  But wasn't noisy enough to.keep us up at night.

I stayed at this hotel with my partner, it was a clean and comfortable hotel. Our balcony faced the ocean which was great and location couldn't be better as the Main Street was just a short walk away. They were doing renovations at the time that we stayed so it was rather noisy and busy with trades. Would stay here again when next in the area.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We're looking forward to making your next visit a great one. See you soon!

Summary: We stayed for four nights in April 2016. The hotel was clean, the staff helpful and polite and the breakfast was tasty (if a little basic). Our room was on the ground floor, which was fine - except the view from the balcony was 'industrial'. As a base for exploring Huntington Beach, this hotel is great!

Summary Heading: Nice place, but they didn't tell us about...
Summary: This seems like a nice hotel, in a very good location, however, when we arrived we were very disappointed to find major construction going on outside our room.  The next property over was digging a well!  The noise was very loud. We had planned on checking in and taking naps. With that level of noise we knew there would be no sleep until they stopped working. We asked for and received a full refund and left. When the new construction is finished it will be quieter, but I think the view will be blocked. Ask about the status of this before you make a reservation.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking time to leave a review. We'd like to make this right, so please give us a call when you have a chance.

Summary: We stayed Feb 22nd--26th.  We were in a room which was remodeled, it was clean and very comfortable.  The only problem we had was the water pressure with the shower head, it just dripped out.  The hot tub and sitting area on the roof is very lovely, the breakfast each morning was plentiful and the hostess was the nicest person.  The location is awesome, we walked each day to restaurants, shops and the pier.  They did have construction going on next door and our room was on that side, but it didn't bother us at all, but during check in the front desk did ask us if we wanted another room, which we did not.  We were very happy with this stay, very clean and friendly

if you are wanting a serene get away don't reserve any hotel on PCH. This is a busy highway but I got a room on the east side of the hotel and it was quiet and recently remodeled. The rooms are adequate and very clean. The free breakfast was quite good with fluffy scrambled eggs and sausage. They had a waffle maker, cereals, bagels, toast and an assortment of beverages. This place would be great for families except they only have a small hot tub on the roof. but the beach is literally across the street so who needs a pool. They give you a AAA discount and the staff was very friendly and helpful. A great price for a total on Huntington Beach within walking distance of all the amenities on Main.Street.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We're looking forward to making your next visit a great one. See you soon!

Summary Heading: We were up graded on request without a problem.
Summary: Neat room with all amenities and excellent ocean views as the hotel is right on the beach. Short stroll to the Pier. Nice eatery just across the road on the beach. The staff were very helpful and arranged the vehicle parking and luggage , but do not forget to tip staff. Great shopping straight into town from the Pier walking distance over the rail line and under the flyover.

Summary Heading: DO NOT STAY HERE!!!!!! HORRIBLE PLACE AND PEOPLE!
Summary: We checked in this past Sunday evening, tired and worn out from an all weekend convention in Anaheim.  The room (219) had a terrible smell and the refrigerator was not working.  The view on the balcony was horrible as it is right next to an oil rig and someone building a house!  We had plans to meet friends in LA that evening so we decided to call the front desk in the morning to ask about the smell and refrigerator. When we left the room that evening, I forgot my phone and walked back and our door was not locked.... apparently you have to really pull in shut and make sure it locks!  Thank God I forgot something.  When we returned it was late and we went to bed.  We were awoken early in the by huge cranes moving steel beams right next to our balcony!!!   They were dangling them
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! Your feedback is important to us, and so is your satisfaction.

Summary: This place has a good location near Main St and the pier. It was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was the standard hotel food.Fitness center was OK, hot tub was nice on the roof. Free parking. The price was a little high for what they offered. I think this place could be so much more, guess time will tell.
Manager Response: Thanks for the review! We're looking forward to making your next visit a great one. See you soon!

Summary: Having been taken over in recent times, it is still undergoing renovations. My room was renovated and I had no issues like some of the others have had. I was happy with facilities within in the room itself even though outside work bothered me at times.  The dining area is cramped. Breakfast was average. Staff handovers need to improve. I almost missed a flight as a cab was not booked. Having said that all staff I interacted with were pleasant and engaging.   Walking distance to beach,shops, restaurants .......
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! We hope you'll give us another try to make your next visit a fantastic one.

Summary: Room smelled, and the room itself was very plain and not a comfortable bed. Shower room wasn't nice at all.  For the price we made we were very disappointed with our experience there. We chose it because the location was the best and that they have going for them for sure. We will not stay there next time we will stay a bit further away for a nicer hotel and better breakfast/fitness centre too.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback; it will help us improve for the future. We hope you'll give us another chance.

Summary: Dear reader, this was our 3rd time staying in this hotel, the first couple times were amazing(at the time it was a best western and the management was great) BUT This last time we stayed October 25th and 26th 2015 was not even close to the experience we had the first couple times. We made the reservation with the knowledge that the hotel was undergoing some renovations BUT did not know that while we were out of the room and the do not disturb sign on the door we would come back to a huge hole in the ceiling bathroom ,drywall all over the floor,toilet and tub, my husband called the front desk and asked what had happened the gal said that they tried to call and no one answered so they went in the room anyway to work on the bathroom (no one called our cell phone #s!)and what was so
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am sorry for the confusion.  We did attempt to contact you to let you know that we had to go in the room.  The city was coming to inspect the fan in that room which why you had seen the ceiling the way it was.  If a guest puts a do not disturb sign on the door we do our best to abide by it, however in this case when the city is in need of inspecting something we must go in and have that done.  I am sorry for the inconvenience as the front desk associate did explain to you why we had gone in the room. Also we never give out information to people other than the guest themselves.  We believe in everyone‚Äôs right to privacy.  I am not sure as to what had happened but we respect each and every guest‚Äôs privacy.  It is our policy not to give out information in person or over the phone.  I am sorry for that and I do hope that you will consider staying with us again. Thank you Hotel Management

Summary: Very nice place clean people are friendly and reasonably priced. I will definitely stop here again. X from the beach and many restaurants... The peer is a nice walk and it's free.. I recommend it highly... It has indoor parking and it's free...
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed it very much and will be back.  I hope that means soon.   Thank you,  Hotel Management

Summary: First night we came in late 39 min check in time . As we waited 1 by 1 patiently to get our rooms at 10 pm .....The hotel lobby had a cheesy sign saying apologies for their renovations but the bucket in the lobby with leaking water down that smelled of sewage was a Lil more intense then expected..... the room  bed mattress was horrible hard.  The roof top jacuzzi was full of drunks and had gentlemen in elevator talking profanitie to guest. The parking garage smelled like is was the local Marijuana hang out.  Breakfast was plain. No fruits unless you count yogurt.   We upgraded the next night asking for a newer renovated room. The jacuzzi jets did not even work and windows so dirty could see ocean front view we expected. We had decided to keep quiet  til while checking out the
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am sorry to hear about the issues you had. However, whenever a guest asks to upgrade we charge an amount plus tax.  The person whom gave you the upgrade did just that.  Also when a guest pays cash we check all of the guests whom pay cash's room.  That is a standard practice across all hotels.  You all stated that the room was worth the upgrade. At your check out there was no mention of your other issues. I do hope next time that you will let us know so they can be taken care of in a timely manner.  Thank you, Hotel Management

Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights with my wife,3rd floor back side of the hotel. The hotel is being renovated. Our room was very clean,the staff were all friendly. I had a problem with the TV and the front desk clerk came to my room within 15 min and had it fixed.   Its a great location.  The breakfast could use some work.  I would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us.  I am happy to hear that the tv issue was taken care of in a timely manner.  We hope to have you come back and stay with us again.  Thank you Hotel Management

Summary: Great experience! Right across the street from the beach, and 2 blocks easy walk to and from Downtown HB! Which is perfect since there seemed to be police driving up and down every street. Underground parking garage was under construction, but still were able to utilize.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking time to comment about your recent stay with us.  I am glad you found the location to work for you.  We are renovating the property and I am sorry for the inconvenience it does cause but we are doing our best to make the guest experience a wonderful one.  This time next year it will be 100 times better.

Summary Heading: Great room for the price and location
Summary: We just got a 1st floor room with no view due to a screen wall, but the room was nice and the location perfect, right across the street from the beach.  The front desk staff was very nice, and the price was very reasonable.  I'd probably stay here again, although I would like to get a room with a view next time.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us.  I am sorry about your view as we were painting.  I can assure you if you call us directly we will make sure you get a view.  We do hope to have you come back soon.  Thank you

Summary: All I can say.  I returned home with bites all over my legs and arm.  The hotel was under renovation which wasn't clearlly stated and my room stunk with fumes and the 'spa' area was closed.  The TV in the room isn't in a good spot to try and watch from the couch.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am sorry that you didn't have a good experience. However, we do have it clearly stated that we are under renovations.  We made sure to post it on the correct websites.  I did check you room thoroughly and even checked to see if some one was in the room before you and after you.  I saw nothing to indicate what you are saying and no one before you or after you has complained.  I have through this entire hotel and I can assure you and others that we have nothing of that kind at this property.  Thank You

Summary: We had to stay in Huntington beach for an early meeting the following day, so we were not being too fussy about accommodations.... we were checking in late and leaving early. The look of the hotel from the outside was a bit rough and outdated so I was disappointed when we checked in. It had a small lobby and was a little outmoded, but the check in clerk was very friendly and very efficient and we were in our room in a few minutes. The room was the nicest surprise. It was very large, had nice furniture and a nice comfy king bed. The bathroom was decent and everything was very clean.... it had a fridge which I love for traveling, a good size flat screen TV and it was quiet. The breakfast was well done for a continental, and the check out process was just as fast as the check in.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am happy to hear that we surprised you in a good way.  We are under remodeling so this time next year it will be a completely different property.  I do hope that your next business trip lands you here and you can stay again to enjoy the new updates.  Thank you,  Dana

Summary: Hotel property is in an excellent area. Right along PCH, just North of the Pier and Main St. The North side of the hotel is really the best side for ocean views. Parking is tight, as it is in all of Huntington Beach, and it will be a challenge for large SUV's or trucks. 7ft clearance for underground parking. Very short walk to pier or Main St, and right nearby is a 7-11 store and A CVS.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and I am happy to hear you liked the location.  We hope to have you come and stay again soon.  Thank You  Dana

Summary: This hotel should be categorized under cheap Motels and priced accordingly. It was under construction during our stay with supplies spewed all over the hotel inside and out. The toilet was broken. The staff was rude upon check in. I would rather camp nextime.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am sorry for you recent experience with us as we want all our guest's to leave with a smile and wanting to come back. Unfortunately we are under renovation and I do apologize for any inconvenience that may have caused your trip. Our staff is trained to be friendly and helpful and I will make sure that are doing that.  I do hope that you will reconsider and give us a try next summer.

Summary Heading: IF YOU LIKE SLEEP DONT STAY HERE!'n
Summary: All of the air conditioning units are broken and make a really loud buzzing noise moved rooms several times the manager was rude 1 of the rooms smelt of urine worst hotel experience of my life DO NOT BOOK THIS HOTEL!!! Carpets are disgusting! When I complained I was made to feel like I should be grateful  I was aloud to move rooms at 1am due to the vibrating wall from the next room having there air conditioning on full pelt the two rooms we moved two were both filthy Pubic hair in of the baths and half a week old sandwich   Under the bed I have never ever felt the need to write a review on here but my experience was that bad I feel the need to let people know like I said do not book here there are plenty of other nice clean hotels in the area
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for bring your issue to our attention.  I am sorry for the experience you had with us recently.  We are in the middle of remodeling the hotel and we are working on all the issues.  We do take what the guest say to us seriously and we are working on resolving all issues.  I do hope that next summer you will stay with us again as you will found the experience to be amazing.

Summary: This was a great location. Room was clean, staff was courteous. Each room had a balcony with a beach view. When they're finished with their disorganized remodel I'm sure it will be very nice. For the value and last minute booking it was worth it.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us and we are working on the property and hope to have it done soon.  We look forward to you coming back and to see the finished product.

Summary Heading: Overall a nice place to stay a night or two
Summary: Great location, across street from beach.  Close to food, bars, shopping.  My only disappointment was that our room had a small porch that faced the ocean,  but the noise and heat from the other room's air conditioner made it impossible to be out there, and impossible to leave the door open and get fresh sea air, which is something i really value as i live in the valley and the air quality is horrible there.  If not for this one warning, the stay was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for that information.  As we are renovating the property we will look into that and see if we can make some changes.  We do hope to have you come back and stay again.

Summary Heading: Falls short in so many ways
Summary: Hotel is in need of cleaning and remodeling. Breakfast closes at 930am even on weekends. Security cameras everywhere and strict rules make it feel more like detention then a hotel stay! Front desk is not friendly or helpful. Room was very noisy and other guest smoked on their patios negating the "non-smoking" room!
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for bringing your issues to our attention.  We are currently renovating the property and it will take some time.  We are addressing the smoking issue as we are a non -smoking property.  I do have that you will give us another try next summer because we will be fully renovated and it will be awesome.

Summary: We just stayed here & we loved it! It is a great hotel. We had a 3rd floor room with a Beach View from our Balcony, it was wonderful!!! The Roof Top Spa & Beach View is amazing too! ;) You park your car in the underground parking area and you can absolutely walk TO EVERYTHING you can possibly think of & all of it is just 2-3 blocks away! They are doing upgrades right now, 1 unit at a time, putting in new flooring, fixtures, & furniture, so that will be an awesome change! Overall it was a great hotel & PERFECT location as you are literally right at the BEACH. Just 2 blocks away is Main Street with ALL the shops & restaurants. You are a 2 block walk to the Pier. Literally a PERFECT location & A great hotel!! The staff were all very nice & professional. (we had a fireplace in our
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking time out to comment about your recent stay with us.  I am happy to hear that even though we are under renovation you still did enjoy our stay.  We hope to have you back next summer when all is done.

Summary Heading: Currently under renovations but all in all a great stay, friendly staff and AMAZING location!
Summary: Stayed in the Master suite.  King bed, ocean view, 1st floor and a jacuzzi.  The room could use some upgrades but was clean and had no major issues.  The location of this property and room is 100% AMAZING!!  Walk to beach, walk to downtown bars and restaurants.....left my car parked in the garage the entire stay!  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  I am so happy to hear that you had a good time and loved the location.  We are in the process of updating all the rooms and we hope to have you come back and stay with us again when that is all done.

Summary: We stayed here for a soccer tournament my daughter was playing. The hotel looks good outside but the inside is not so good. Our room A/C was noisy and hard to sleep, we stayed for 2 nights. The room was bad, carpet dirty, bedding not nice, bed not comfortable, things wrong with the restroom.... but they are remodeling. I will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I am sorry for the experience you had with your recent stay with us.  We are under renovation which can be disruptive at times but unavoidable. I do hope that you will reconsider your decision and stay with us again as we will have the entire property done soon.

Summary: Huntington Beach is our favorite California beach but it can be pricey to stay at an oceanfront hotel.  The Best Western Regency is only 3 miles away from the ocean (5 minutes) and if you have a family, this is a great option.  The rooms are spacious and include a large refrigerator.  Even with 4 of us in the room, we did not feel cramped.  The hotel is very clean and the front desk staff is very responsive.  There is a pool and hot tub on site although there is no exercise room or laundry.  If you have children, you will want to spend all of your time at the beach anyways.  The price is a bargain even during prime summer time and the continental breakfast should really be advertised as a full breakfast.  They had fresh fruit, oatmeal, cereals, eggs, sausage, pancakes, milk,

I had stayed at this same hotel in the past and was completely satisfied. My experience this time was not good. The plumbing broke down and failed to provide hot water for a 36 hour period. For the price that I paid this is unacceptable. If the room rate were lower that what is currently charged, i would probably stay again.
Manager Response: We're sorry that you had a less than stellar experience with us. We'd like a chance to make things right so please try us again!

Summary Heading: Even though we experienced issues, they made it right
Summary: Our trip encountered issues with power.  The Hotel is undergoing some improvements and since we had continuous power fluctuations, the management and staff made the problems worth while and the service is what will bring our family back to this establishment.  Great room and amenities.

Wanted to see the beach and spend time on the coast with the family before spending several days at Disneyland. The rooms were very big, roomy and comfortable. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The atmosphere was laid back and it was nice having a small fridge and microwave. The AC worked well and the room was quiet for the most part. Nice not paying extra for parking.

This hotel is extremely old and dirty. I was unable to allow my child to crawl on the floor because he would get black palms and knees. The bathroom was covered in black mold and appeared as if it has been painted over to hide it. Very disappointed in this location as Best westerns are usually her go to option when looking for a hotel.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! Your feedback is important to us, and so is your satisfaction.

Summary: Overall the room was okay but I had to stay in a room that need repairs on the toilets and showers. I could have taken a better shower under a garden hose. I notified the staff that the repairs need to be done and I was told they would put it on their to do list. I wasn't even offered another room.
Manager Response: We're sorry that you had a less than stellar experience with us. We'd like a chance to make things right so please try us again!

Summary Heading: LOTS OF HIDDEN POLICIES AND SEWAGE IN SINK!!!!!
Summary: Arrival was bad to begin with, just to check in was a hassle. Greg was very slow to check me in, he fielded a call and answered questions for a potential guest while I waited for five minutes before he finally got back to me, it finally took another 10 minutes to get me sorted with my room key. Not only did we not have a view, our room faces an ally. Room 105 was clean enough, but in the morning we woke up to a smelly and unpleasant surprise. A black bile popped up out of our sink which was right by our bed. It smelled and looked rank. When we informed the receptionist she asked for the room number and when we said 105 she did not seem surprised. She said "OH, ill send maintenance", when he showed up he mentioned the problem is common but we had to leave and check out early
Manager Response: We're sorry about your experience. Please call us if you'd like to talk about the specifics of your situation.

Summary: The rooms have had no up keep done on them for a very long time. sliding glass door to the balcony is broken and my wife got locked out. the door to the room would not shut completely, the bathroom door would not stay shut at all, the toilet flusher was broke as well as the toilet paper holder. no chairs to sit on at all.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! Your feedback is important to us, and so is your satisfaction.

Summary: Stayed 2 nights for business in local area.  Great location, convenient short walk to Main St, Pier, and Beach.  On check in, I was given an ADA equipped room with a broken security door latch (room 111 or 112) brought it to the front desk's attn, and was cheerfully given another room. Mgmt- please make sure this is fixed!  The room was clean, well equipped, comfy and updated bed and linens. Cute patio/balcony. As with any inn that fronts a street, there will be some road noise but there was less then I expected. Wifi was free and decent.  A few reviews have highlighted street people in the area. Reader! This is a beach town on the main drag! Local flavor is part of the charms of a beach town. Use normal cautions and you'll be fine. Make sure and get the brochure for the

Room was clean, equipped with micro & mini fridge.  Balcony off side, not facing beach tho.  Hotel is across the street from beach, free parking & decent breakfast items in the morning.   Good stay overall, would stay here again, close to everything. Minimal street noise - it is PCH, busy street tho.

This was a great place to stay. Central to Main Street and the Pier.  We had a great time.  Hotel Staff was very friendly and accomodating. We would definately go back to this location if our travels ever take us back to the West Coast.

We wanted to be close to the pier and we were. You can walk to shops,  eating, the beach and the pier. You are right on PCH which makes getting around the area very simple. Rooms are spotless and were made up everyday. Pop machine was broken throughout our stay. Breakfast left a lot to be desired. I went down 5 min. late . Door was locked. Employees were in there eating. Saw me and hollered out "It's closed! Parking garage under hotel is a great bonus. If going with the intent to see the sights and not looking for luxury this place has what was important to us. Location and cleanliness. Staff is pleasant."

Great location to walk to resturants, night clubs and beach. Rooms where very nice and clean had veiw ocean and balcony to sit outside. Staff where nice and helpful. Great place to stay if you want to enjoy the beach.

very nice for the price.  hard time accessing the internet.  used internet to get room and when i arrived it was a different price and had to show the clerk.  if you make a reservation online bring your receipt.

Fantastic location, delicious breakfast, and free parking!  Can't go wrong! I will definitely stay there again and can't wait to do so!  I love Huntington Beach!  One of my most favorite places in the world.

The hotel inside is average but the immediate outside is bad. Lots of homeless people/drug addicts. Graffiti on empty lot next door. The homeless people were sleeping on the outside of the balconies of rooms on the first floor. We parked our 2nd vehicle outside on street and someone hit our car. Its worth paying more in a better area of HB then paying less and dealing with the surrounding area.
Manager Response: We're sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar experience! Your feedback is important to us, and so is your satisfaction.

Summary Heading: good location/great view/under usual BW quality
Summary: This hotel is located in Huntington Beach and all attractions are within walking distance. The parking is free, which is a major convenience. I liked it overall but it was missing basic amenities such as any information on the hotel or area attractions and the hide-a-bed had no linens, nor were there any extra linens in the room.
Manager Response: Thanks for your feedback. We appreciate the review and hope to see you soon!

Summary: Great location across the street from the beach. Easy walking distance to main street.  Smallish room but comfortable bed.  We opened up the patio door and enjoyed the nice beach air but once we closed the door we never could get it open again.  Breakfast was typical Best Western fare.  We would definitely stay there again.

Check-in was fast, staff were friendly and helpful.  The room was comfortable.  The location is excellent.  Will definitely stay there again.  Access to parking is also excellent.  I will also recommend others to stay at this location if in Huntington Beach.

In just a spur of the moment overnight stay we received excellent, caring service which will cause us to return for a longer stay in the future. You just lost an excellent review because of your unreasonable requirement of writing more than I felt like writing in expressing my views of the subject.  Not very smart on your part.  Unless this requirement is changed you will receive no future reviews from me.

Summary Heading: What Do You Expect, It's Just A Motel?
Summary: Free parking is the reason why I picked this place. Breakfast was nutritionally adequate, scrambled egg and sausage. A collection of sugary commercial cereals, coffee, tea bags, milk, 2 juices, everything is loaded with preservatives and hydrogenated fat. Occasionally they will serve fresh meat but only when some poor unfortunate creature didn't make it safely across the road during the previous evening.

Summary Heading: Best place by far, close to the pier and ocean views.
Summary: You can't book this place online and they can't email you a confirmation but you won't find a better location especially for the price. They give a military discount and continental breakfast. We'll be back for sure!

Close to beach and downtown!  Good value for your money. They provide a breakfast area, a coffee machine off the lobby, a workout room, and the USA Today.  We have stayed at the hotel for business and leisure trips.  We recommend it for business, couples, family, with friends or solo.

The hotel is very nice with balconys that give you a view of the beach and ocean. To get to the spa which is on the roof,  you have to go up a flight of stairs after taking the elevator to the 3rd floor. People with disablites will find this diffuclut. Rooms are a good size for two people. Hotel is clean and staff helpful.

Our door lock was broken, so every time we wanted to return to our room we had to ask staff to let us in. Our toilet was broken upon arrival and we fixed it ourselves. We were traveling with a small child and they put us in the noisiest room off the lobby. We asked to move upon check-in and were told no. We ended up leaving at 5:30AM because we were unable to sleep due to water running somewhere in the walls in our room. We were not offered any apology when we checked out, clearly upset with a crying 2 year old before dawn. Wouldn't stay here again..-And I'm a BW Rewards member and typically like BW.
Manager Response: Dear guest i have 2 employees distinctly remembering talking to your husband and he was offered an upgrade he declined.however i apologize for the in convenience  it has. caused you.Roh patel G/M.

Summary: This hotel was excellent, we had a nice woman check us in. Rooms were clean. Included fridge and microwave. Patio was ample size (no chairs though, not sure if its because they were upgrading or getting new or what not) We did not pay for ocean view and had non ocean view unit however standing out on patio low and behold I could see the ocean!! Its not a 5 star hotel but it was clean, and breakfast was bagels, pastries, scambled eggs, coffee, juices, yogurt and make your own waffles. Amenities were enigma products. The hotel was across the street from ocean, main street with lots of shopping, starbucks, bars etc a few blocks away and walkable. CVS close as was the Huntington beach pier. I will be coming back here. The only thing was there was a surf competition going on so we
Manager Response: Dear guest i thank you for the compilment and yes you were right we are in process of remodeling and are waiting for the patio chairs.Thank you again.Roh patel g/m

Summary: This was a very nice hotel. Very Clean. The staff was great and right across the street from the beach. A short walk to the Huntington Beach Pier. Beautiful sunsets. Plenty of restaurants nearby and a lot to do.
Manager Response: I hope you got see all the restaurants in the area an watch the beautiful sunset Thank you

Summary: We were looking for a nice stay near the beach.  We got that, but, the phone did not work in our room (just in case we needed it), the internet kept going off line and you had to keep logging back in and it was not high speed. The breakfast area was horrible. Don't go to breakfast if you don't want to get crammed into a sardine can. The area is so small that it is all you can do to get you food. The only way we would stay at this Best Western is if we wanted to be within walking distance of the pier.
Manager Response: Dear guest i thank you for bringing the forefront i apologize for the in convenience this may have caused you.the management is aware of these issues and we plan on remodeling the hotel this fall so please be patient check us out in the future.Thank you so much.Roh patel g/m

Summary: I should of initially followed my gut instincts when on arrival , the arrogant sweaty man behind the front desk was too busy to even acknowledge my arrival, instead insisting on selling another room to someone else , which is very ironic as many months in advance we booked a room with a view, although unbeknown to ourselves it was a room witha view ....of the lobby roof !!!    When asked simply if we could be moved , we were told the hotel was full ....strange as I only counted 6 cars in the parking garage ..   It wasn't just that member of staff ,all of the front desk staff didnt acknowledge our leaving or arrival at anytime ...no good morning , afternoon or evening , although if it means anything the lady that helps with breakfast was more than helpful ,   Now the rooms ..hmmm
Manager Response: Dear guest i am very sorry to hear those comments,i am surprised my staff is always smiling and greeting please accept my apology i will do a full investigation on what went on that day.Thank you

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Huntington Beach Best Western. The location of the hotel is the best thing about it. I thought the price was a little high for this property. The employees at this hotel are very nice and helpful. Our sliding balcony door was in need of being replaced.
Manager Response: Dear guest i am so pleased to her positive comments please check us out after the fall remodeling.Thank you

Summary: Always have great service at this hotel...and you can hear the waves at night from your balcony it's so close to the beach!! Walking distance from main street & the pier also. Have stayed with a group & with spouse, always a good time!  Rooftop spa is nice too...Fireplace/Heaters in some of the rooms also. Will be back for sure !!

We recently stayed at this hotel for a weekend while visiting friends in Huntington Beach! We were very pleased with the service and location of this hotel!! Just a walk across the street to the beach and 2 blocks from Main Street. A tad more than what we wanted to spend, but truly the bed bang for your buck. The only negative this I can say is that the bed was super uncomfortable!!! Bring your own pillow and blanket (and a memory foam if you can)! Service was good, free parking and discount given if you book through hotel.

would highly stay here love the location great value quiet hotel. free breakfast in the morning. across from the beach staff very nice. free parking. clean hotel everything you need. great restaurants with in walking distance

great place in prime location.  Easy walk to Main street shops and food.  Pier & Ocean front right across street.  Get a room with a view.  You won't regret it.  Grab a fish taco at Wahoo's on Main St.   TOP NOTCH!
Manager Response: Thank you for uplifting our staff and I.Thank YOU. Roh patel G/M

Summary: Our daughter goes to college in So Cal and we often like to visit her and spend time in beach friendly town of Huntington.  While many hotels "near the beach" can be $250 a night or much higher, we were happy to find this Best Western offering lower rates than the usual and being nice enough to offer free parking, breakfast, and WiFi.  Not always the case at other places.  We will definitely return and use this as an option for our family fun place to stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for letting the world know we are best kept secreton the beach in huntington beach.THANKYOU

Summary: Great location- about a 10 minute walk to shops, the beach, and restaurants. Beds weren't that comfortable, but there was free parking, internet, and breakfast. If you want to use the pool & hot tub they only allow 8 people up on the roof and you have to make reservations with the front desk and must use your room key.

I stayed here for 1/2 month of December 2013. I got a better rate at the front desk from Manager Greg. Have been back for several additional visits.  Has parking and fridge/ microwave in room. Value for the $$$ per night. Would return again as long as price didn't increase over the 115-135/ night.

The hotel was conveniently located for the beach area. The room came with two double beds (a decent size main and a slightly smaller one). Decor was a little tired but to be honest, not a problem as we didn't plan to spend much time in it!  Wifi was good. As was the complimentary breakfast. Would stay here again.

GREAT location when you just need a little getaway. Across the street from the beach & down the street from the pier with awesome bars & restaurants. The cable was AWESOME too- they have on demand stuff which I appreciated. Great place to stay especially considering the price

Summary Heading: great location, great room, great experience
Summary: hotel was in a perfect location, across the street from the beach and 2 blocks away from nightlife.staff was very friendly and room was very clean and comfortably overall we will be staying here again.

This hotel was a very clean and nice hotel. The parking is perfect and it is across the street from the beach. The Front desk workers were very helpful. The only problem is that the pillows were too small. they are little cubes and are worthless. Location is excellent and it was quiet.

Stayed 1 night at Best Western Huntington Beach Inn.  I picked this hotel due to the close location to the main attractions in Huntington Beach-as well as the beach being across the street from the hotel.  Location was perfect, hotel was clean, staff was friendly.  Plus free parking and wifi.  I would stay here again!!
Manager Response: as the g/m i thank you and as always i know you enjoyed your stay

Summary: The staff went far above and beyond the call of duty to help us out.  Words can not express how much they helped us out!!  Location perfectly located in Huntington Beach - one block north from pier and one block from Main Street.

This hotel was 3 small blocks from the Main Street in Huntington Beach on PCH.  Nice room, we had a partial view from the 2nd floor.  Free continental bfast & parking.  We had problem with the sink and they fixed it right away.  Good size room but very small bathroom.  We stayed from July 13- 16 it was 260.00 a night due to the prime location...but it's comparable to the other places in the area.  Other then the 2 resorts that was in the area this was probably the next best hotel.  I would recommend this place.

You get what you pay for- this is our second time in Huntington and first time at this hotel. It was less expensive and worth it- could use a face lift and some new pillows an mattresses but over all the free parking and breakfast were a plus for us- we will be back

We arrived 15 minutes prior to check in to a dark, hot, filthy lobby and were greeted by the most unpleasant woman I have encountered in a hotel lobby. We were told that our room was not ready at 2:45 and that we would have to wait. Once the room was ready, it was hot, small and did not smell fresh at all. I was very disappointed but this was our second to last day of vacation so I tried to write it off and have fun anyway. That night when we returned after dinner we were told the roof top spa was closed at 10:00 so at 9:40 we could not have access. That was very annoying as we were looking forward to a dip in the hot tub before bed. Although in retrospect I think I am happy it was closed because who knows what condition of filth the hot tub was in! So we decided to go to bed

Summary Heading: Nice small clean inn on PCH across from beach
Summary: Staff are very welcoming and accommodating.  Hotel rooms are clean and beds are comfortable.   Our room had a balcony.  Our stay was quiet and there were many other families.  There were no loud parties or noise while we were there 3 nights.  Breakfast area is small, but staffed by a very wonderful lady who keeps everything stocked and helps you find what you need.   Their coffee was excellent.  The parking garage under the hotel was great.  We walked a short distance to a crosswalk to get to the beach without having to get the car out.  There is an elevator to bring your luggage up to the room.  The hotel has a spa on the roof if you get a key from the front desk to access it.      No laundry facilities on site but if desperate a coin laundry is a block or so away.  Hotel

This hotel is directly across the street from the beach - an easy cross.  It is also a few blocks walk to downtown Huntingdon, so no worries about parking. The hotel garage is underground and we had no problems ever finding a space. Breakfast space was smallish. Rooms were clean.  We felt is was a good value for the location.

Stayed here for 4th July so paid a fortune for the room, much more than it was worth. But it was perfectly located, just a stones throw away from the pier with the beach across the street.   Room came equipped with a fridge, microwave and free WiFi and free parking in the underground garage.  Room is dated, but clean and even has a small balcony with a partial view of the ocean. Friendly staff and adequate service overall.

I cant complain about my room, it was big, clean and comfortable. The hotel is just accross the beach, and just 3 blocks away from Main Street. If you go to this beach for the surfing this is more than ok. Dont expect a honeymoon type of hotel cause this is not. This is a hotel beach and the value is pretty good for what you get. There are restaurants nearby and the pier is just walking distance. I would come back for surfing vacations.

Summary Heading: Best of the west,for a safe clean affordable stay on the beach
Summary: I have stayed here a number of times over the years; Roh Patel and staff add a personal touch to ensure your stay is a safe and pleasant one. The most important for myself, is to know I can get a good nights rest, not having all night parties keeping you up all night and knowing the grounds are monitored closely. Thanks staff and we will see you again next year. Dr. Harold B.,Pawleys Island SC

We stayed here for 4 nights on a Huntington Beach vacation.  Unlike the high priced hotels down the street, parking in the parking garage is free and there is no ripoff "resort fee".  Accommodations are basic with a small room but with microwave, refrigerator, free WiFi, etc.  The rooms each have a little balcony with 2 chairs and a table.  You can sip coffee in the morning and enjoy the ocean across the street but be aware you are looking over the 6 lane Pac Coast highway as well as a few oil wells.  We enjoyed the view anyway. There is a small breakfast room with a few outdoor tables.  The breakfast attendant was very friendly and helpful, she even offered to pour our coffee.  Breakfast is the basic typical hotel free breakfast of coffee, juices, cereal, a waffle machine and

We stayed for 4 nights and changed rooms 3 times in those four nights.  Check in was at 3 PM.  We arrived at 3 PM and checked in.  The room they gave us on the first floor was okay, but when my husband looked out the balcony all you could see was a very high concrete wall with an oil pumper behind it!  We went back to the front desk and told them the room was unacceptable because of this.  After about 15 minutes they agreed to move us to another room.  We were then moved to the third floor.  When we got there and opened the door it looked like there had been a frat party in that room the night before.  Lamp shades off, flip flops on the floor, blankets tossed all over.  We again went to the front desk and complained.  They sent housekeeping up and they cleaned the room (about 35

nice room, rec'd quiet room as requested.  very good night sleep.  breakfast area small, selection small. location across street from beach, very nice. parking was good, underground garage. felt safe.  internet worked just fine.

Excellent hotel! We took 3 teenagers along with my husband and I. We got 2 rooms and they made sure the kids were directly across the hall from us. Very nice, room and CLEAN rooms. Across the street from the beach and a block from all the restaurants and shops downtown. You can't beat staying here. They also don't tolerate partying and loudness so it's really perfect for traveling with a family.
